original_text: While they were there, they told people the good news about Jesus. Many people in Derbe became believers. After that, Paul and Barnabas returned to Lystra. From there they went back to Iconium. Then they returned to Antioch in the region of Pisidia.
korean_text: 복음을 그 성에서 전하여 많은 사람을 제자로 삼고 루스드라와 이고니온과 안디옥으로 돌아가서

sentences.original_text: they told people the good news about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들에게 예수님에 대한 좋은 소식을 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: Many people in Derbe became believers
sentences.korean_translation: 데르베의 많은 사람들이 믿는 사람들이 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: Paul and Barnabas returned to Lystra
From there they went back to Iconium
